class.name: Timer
class.description: Emit a signal at specified interval either once or repeatedly.

method.name: get_time_left
method.description: Return the time left for timeout in seconds if the timer is active, 0 otherwise.

method.name: is_paused
method.description: Return if the timer is paused or not.

method.name: set_paused
method.description: Set whether the timer is paused or not. A paused timer will be inactive until it is unpaused again.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], Timer will automatically start when entering the scene tree. Default value: [code]false[/code].
If [code]true[/code], Timer will restart when reaching 0. If [code]false[/code], Timer will stop. Default value: [code]true[/code].
Processing mode. Uses TIMER_PROCESS_* constants as value.

constants.constant: Update the Timer during the physics step at each frame (fixed framerate processing).
Update the Timer during the idle time at each frame.
